item.description:
This Narrow Distance
The Worcester Center for Crafts, 25 Sagamore Road, Worcester, will host an Opening Night Celebration for a new photography exhibit in the Center's Krikorian Gallery, This Narrow Distance, on Thursday, January 17th from 5:30-7:30 p.m. The exhibit features works by Stephen DiRado, Keiko Hiromi, Hank Haptmann, Lindsey Camilli, Robert M. Johnson and Sarah Bilotta, and was curated by Louie Despres. Admission to the opening night celebration is FREE. Enjoy hors d'oeuvres and a cash bar. Return on Saturday, January 26th at 2 p.m. for an Artists Talk with photographers Sarah Bilotta and Hank Hauptmann. Admission is also free. This Narrow Distance will be on view through February 9th. Krikorian Gallery is open Tuesday thru Saturday, 10 a.m. - 5 p.m. WOO Card holders can swipe for Double WOO points.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Photography Opening: This Narrow Distance
